00336 template<class function>
00337         void C4DView::FunctionSlot<function>::createFunction(C4DView *view) {
00338 
00339 #   ifdef USE_AUTO_PTR
00340         view->F.reset
00341 #   else
00342         if (view->F) delete view->F;
00343         view->F =
00344 #endif
00345             (new function (view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00346                            view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00347                            view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ()));
00348 
00349     SingletonLog::Instance() << "FunctionSlot<function>::createFunction(): "
00350             << view->F->getFunctionName().toStdString()
00351             << "(" << view->F->getParameterName(0).toStdString()
00352             << "," <<view->F->getParameterName(1).toStdString() <<","
00353             << view->F->getParameterName(2).toStdString() <<","
00354             << view->F->getParameterName(3).toStdString()<<")\n";
00355 
00356     view->menu->updateFunctionMenu (view->F->getFunctionName());
00357     view->AssignValues (view->F);
00358     view->Redraw ();
00359 }
00360 
00366 template<class function>
00367         void C4DView::FunctionSlot<function>::createSurface(C4DView *view) {
00368 
00369 #   ifdef USE_AUTO_PTR
00370     view->F.reset
00371 #   else
00372             if (view->F) delete view->F;
00373     view->F =
00374 #endif
00375             (new function (view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00376              view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du ()));
00377 
00378     if(0) std::cerr << "FunctionSlot<function>::createSurface(): " << view->F->getFunctionName().toStdString()
00379                 << "(" << view->F->getParameterName(0).toStdString() <<","<<view->F->getParameterName(1).toStdString() <<","<<
00380                 view->F->getParameterName(2).toStdString() <<","<< view->F->getParameterName(3).toStdString()<<")"<< std::endl;
00381 
00382     try {
00383         view->menu->updateFunctionMenu (view->F->getFunctionName());
00384     } catch (QString error) {
00385         QMessageBox::information (NULL, "Error", error);
00386 
00387     }
00388     view->AssignValues (view->F);
00389 
00390     view->Redraw ();
00391 }

00406 template<class function>
00407         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomFunction(C4DView *view) {
00408             function *tmp = new function (
00409                 view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00410                 view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00411                 view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ());
00412             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00413 #               ifdef USE_AUTO_PTR
00414                     view->F.reset(tmp);
00415                     QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00416 #               else
00417                     if (view->F) delete view->F;
00418                     view->F = tmp;
00419                     QString sym (((function *)(view->F))->symbolic());
00420 #               endif
00421 
00422                 view->AssignValues(view->F);
00423                 view->Redraw ();
00424             } else {
00425                 delete tmp;
00426                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00427             }
00428         }
00429 
00436 template<class function>
00437         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomSurface(C4DView *view) {
00438             function *tmp = new function (view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00439                                           view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du ());
00440             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00441 #               ifdef USE_AUTO_PTR
00442                 view->F.reset(tmp);
00443                 QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00444 #               else
00445                 if (view->F) delete view->F;
00446                 view->F = tmp;
00447                 QString sym (((function *)(view->F))->symbolic());
00448 #               endif
00449 
00450                 view->AssignValues(view->F);
00451                 view->Redraw ();
00452             } else {
00453                 delete tmp;
00454                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00455             }
00456         }
